name: Tortellini Salad With Corn
keywords: corn on the cob, sun-dried tomato, tortellini, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: Cooked kernels from 3 ears of corn
1/2 cup finely chopped fresh tomato pulp
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the tortellini until done. Drain, then rinse in cold water and drain again well.
Mix tortellini with corn and lemon peel.
Beat lemon juice and olive oil together, pour over the tortellini and toss gently.
Add basil, tomato pulp, sun-dried tomatoes and scallions. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Allow to marinate briefly before serving.
